description:
A daily cleanser which removes a build-up of dirt and oil on the skin with a mix of Baobab Extract and Tasmanian Pepper. Aloe Vera helps to leave skin feeling refreshed, clean and hydrated.


Product Features:

  • Say hello to our natural Men's Range, formulated specifically for Men's skin!
  • Our natural revitalising Shaving Gel For Men has Tasmanian Pepper for soothing and Baobab Extract to lubricate skin for a close and comfortable shave
  • Sesame Oil and Chamomile help to hydrate and soothe skin, leaving it fresh and smooth. A masculine blend of Cinnamon and Citrus refreshes the senses
  • Australian Made, Carbon Neutral, Cruelty Free, Natural Ingredients, Vegan, Recyclable Packaging
  • INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Extract (Baobab), Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract (Tasmanian Pepper), Glycerin, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil (Cinnamon), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*. *Natural Component of Essential Oil
name: Sukin 225ML
